alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:08PM MST until March 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST FRIDAY TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Southern Mountains above 8000 feet. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
